                     c24.fastLoad.store('25', '1ef65bc9d6');

               <script>
      var googletag = googletag || {};
      googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];

      var gptMappingFullContainerWidth;

      googletag.cmd.push(function() {
         googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
         googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
         googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs(true);
         googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
            var id = event.slot.getSlotElementId();

            $(document).ready(function() {
               var bannerContainer = $('#' + id);
               if (bannerContainer.data('hidden') == true) bannerContainer.removeClass('hide-simple');
            });
         });

         gptMappingFullContainerWidth = googletag.sizeMapping().addSize([c24.meta.breakPoints.lg, 0], [[1190, 121], [1190, 120], [1170, 120], [728, 90]]).addSize([c24.meta.breakPoints.md, 0], [[980, 120], [980, 100], [980, 99], [980, 90], [970, 250], [970, 90], [970, 60], [728, 90], [720, 110]]).addSize([c24.meta.breakPoints.sm, 0], [[720, 120], [720, 110], [468, 60], [300, 250], [250, 250], [200, 200]]).addSize([0, 0], [[300, 250], [320, 160], [320, 75], [320, 50], [320, 100], [320, 150], [300, 75], [300, 50], [250, 250], [200, 200]]).build();
      });
   </script>

   <script>
      var bannerSide;
      
      googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            $(document).ready(function() {
                  if (($(window).width() - $('.container').width()) / 2 - -1 * parseInt($('#banner-result-list-side').css('right')) >= 160) {
                     $('#banner-result-list-side').removeClass('hide-simple');
                     bannerSide = googletag.defineSlot('/5353745/Search_300x600', [[120, 600], [160, 600]], 'banner-result-list-side').
                        addService(googletag.pubads());
                  }
                  
                  $(window).on('resize', function() {
                        if (($(window).width() - $('.container').width()) / 2 - -1 * parseInt($('#banner-result-list-side').css('right')) < 160) $('#banner-result-list-side').remove();
                     });
               });
         });
   

      c24.banner = c24.banner || {};
      c24.banner.resultView = '';
      c24.banner.listSlots = [];

      $(document).ready(function() {
            c24.banner.resultView = 'block';
         });

      googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            c24.banner.listSlots.push(googletag.defineSlot('/5353745/ResultListFirst-RD', [728, 90], 'banner-result-list-items-first').
               defineSizeMapping(gptMappingFullContainerWidth).
               addService(googletag.pubads()));
         });

      googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            c24.banner.listSlots.push(googletag.defineSlot('/5353745/ResultListSecond-RD', [728, 90], 'banner-result-list-items-second').
               defineSizeMapping(gptMappingFullContainerWidth).
               addService(googletag.pubads()));
         });
   </script>
<script>
      googletag.cmd.push(function() {
         googletag.pubads().setTargeting('Domain', c24.meta.serverName);
         googletag.pubads().setTargeting('PageType', c24.meta.pageId);
         googletag.pubads().setTargeting('Language', c24.meta.language.toUpperCase());
         googletag.pubads().setTargeting('Brands', c24.getData('abNormalizedName'));
         googletag.pubads().setTargeting('ModelID', c24.getData('abModelId'));
         googletag.pubads().setTargeting('Customer', c24.getData('visitorStatus'));
         googletag.pubads().setTargeting('locale', c24.meta.locale);
         googletag.pubads().setTargeting('TC', c24.getData('gptTC'));
         googletag.pubads().setTargeting('BrandInterests', c24.getData('brandInterests'));

         if (c24.hasData('merchantPremium')) {
            googletag.pubads().setTargeting('MerchantPremium', c24.getData('merchantPremium'));
         }

         if (c24.hasData('gptCustomerId')) {
            googletag.pubads().setTargeting('ID', c24.getData('gptCustomerId'));
         }

         googletag.pubads().setTargeting('Expert', c24.getData('gptExpert'));
         googletag.enableServices();
      });

      $(window).load(function() {
         $(window).on('responsiveModeChange', function() {
            c24.banner.refreshGPT();
         });

         $(window).on('orientationchange', function(e) {
            $(window).one('resize', function() {
               c24.tools.orientationChanged().then(function() {
                  c24.banner.refreshGPT();
               });
            });
         });

         setTimeout(function() {
            c24.banner.refreshGPT();
         }, 100);
      });
   </script>

                  $(document).ready(function () {
                     $(".js-login-link").on('click', function (event) {
                        $('body').trigger('closeFlyoutNavigation');

                        c24.colorbox.createJsonp("https://www.chrono24.fr/user/login-layer.htm?ajax=1&ts=" + Number(new Date()), {
                           size: c24.meta.isMobile ? 'md' : 'sm',
                           forceInvalidate: true,

<script>
   var searchTitles = {
      md: c24.getData('searchtitleMD'),
      sm: c24.getData('searchtitleSM'),
      xs: c24.getData('searchtitleXS'),
      noWatch: c24.getData('searchtitleNoWatch')
   };

   $(window).load(function () {
      var query = $('#query');

      query.c24Autocomplete({
         url: c24.getData('watchSuggestUrl'),
         resultContainer: '#jq-ac-results',
         noHitsSuggestText: c24.getTranslation("label.pressEnterToSearch"),
         useMaxAvailableWidth: true,
         clearSearchStorageText: c24.getTranslation('search.filters.clear-search-history'),
         overlaySelector: ".jq-header-search",
         userInput: query.val().trim(),
         sendEmptyMask: true,
         trackSearchSubmit: true,
         initialTabs: [
            {
               id: 'recentSearches',
               name: c24.getTranslation('search.filters.recent-searches'),
               endpointUrl: null,
               searchStorage: true,
               sourceData: function() {
                  return getSearchStorageAsXml();
               },
               order: c24.meta.isNewVisitor && !getSearchStorage().length ? 2 : 1,
               onSelect: function(tab) {
                  tce(tab.id, 'search-tab');
               }
            },
            {
               id: 'topSearches',
               name: c24.getTranslation('search.filters.top-searches'),
               endpointUrl: c24.getData('searchTopUrl'),
               order: c24.meta.isNewVisitor && !getSearchStorage().length ? 1 : 2,
               onSelect: function(tab) {
                  tce(tab.id, 'search-tab');
               }
            },
         ],
         tabs: [
            {
               id: 'watches',
               endpointUrl: c24.getData('watchSuggestUrl'),
               name: c24.getTranslation('watchtypes.U'),
               parameters: {
                  watchTypes: '',
                  accessoryTypes: '',
               },
               hideAutocomplete: false,
               selected: c24.getData('topSearchSelectedTab') == 'watches',
               onSelect: function (tab) {
                  tce(tab.id, 'search-tab');
               }
            },
            {
               id: 'parts',
               endpointUrl: c24.getData('accessorySuggestUrl'),
               name: c24.getTranslation('watchtypes.Z'),
               parameters: {
                  watchTypes: 'Z',
                  accessoryTypes: '',
               },
               hideAutocomplete: false,
               selected: c24.getData('topSearchSelectedTab') == 'parts',
               onSelect: function (tab) {
                  tce(tab.id, 'search-tab');
               }
            },
            {
               id: 'bracelets',
               endpointUrl: c24.getData('bandStrapSuggestUrl'),
               name: c24.getTranslation('accessorytypes.2000'),
               parameters: {
                  watchTypes: 'Z',
                  accessoryTypes: '2000',
               },
               hideAutocomplete: false,
               selected: c24.getData('topSearchSelectedTab') == 'bracelets',
               onSelect: function (tab) {
                  tce(tab.id, 'search-tab');
               }
            }
         ],
      });

      $(window).resize(function () {
         setQueryPlaceholder();
      });
      setQueryPlaceholder();

      $('#language-switch-header').on('click', function () {
         c24.colorbox.createJsonp(c24.getData('localizationChangeUrl'), {size: "md"});
      });
   });

   $(window).load(function () {
      $('.i-delete', '#header-search').click(function () {
         var instance = $('#query').get(0).ac;

         if (instance != null) {
            $('#query').val('').focus().keyup();
         }
      });
   });

   function setQueryPlaceholder() {
      var searchTitle = searchTitles[c24.tools.responsiveSize()];

      if (searchTitle != null) {
         $('#query').attr('placeholder', searchTitle);
      }
   }

   function storeSearchStorageModel() {
      if('searchStorageModel' in c24.meta.data) {
         var searchStorage = [];
         var newEntry = c24.meta.data.searchStorageModel;

         try {
            if(localStorage.getItem('searchStorage') != null) {
               searchStorage = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('searchStorage'));

               searchStorage.forEach(function(entry, index) {
                  if(newEntry.label === entry.label && newEntry.explanation === entry.explanation) {
                     searchStorage.splice(index, 1);
                  }
               });
            }

            if(String(newEntry.label).trim().length) {
               searchStorage.unshift(newEntry);
            }

            searchStorage = searchStorage.slice(0, 5);

            localStorage.setItem('searchStorage', JSON.stringify(searchStorage));
         } catch (e) {
            // empty
         }
      }
   }

   function getSearchStorage() {
      try {
         return localStorage.getItem('searchStorage') ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('searchStorage')) : [];
      } catch (e) {
         // c24.errors.logWarning('Error in search', 'search-js.jsp.inc', 0, 0, e);
         return [];
      }
   }

   function getSearchStorageAsXml() {
      var xml = "<root>";

      getSearchStorage().forEach(function(entry) {
         if(entry.originalPath) {
            xml += "<option url='" + entry.originalPath + "' filter-text='" + entry.explanation + "'>" + entry.label + "</option>";
         } else {
            xml += "<option url='" + c24.getData('searchIndexUrl') + entry.searchParams + "&dosearch=true' filter-text='" + entry.explanation + "'>" + entry.label + "</option>";
         }
      });

      xml += "</root>";

      return xml;
   }

   function getSelectedTab() {
      var query = $('#query');
      return query.get(0).ac != undefined ? query.get(0).ac.getCacheId() : 'watches';
   }

   $(document).ready(function () {
      $('#query').click(function () {
         tce(getSelectedTab(), 'search-input');
      });

      $('#header-search button').click(function () {
         if($('#query').val().length) {
            tce(getSelectedTab(), 'search-submit-typed');
         }
      });

      //remove after A/B-Test PO-1400
      $('.js-submit-tracking').keydown(function e() {
         if(event.which == 13 || event.keyCode == 13) {
            tce(getSelectedTab(), 'search-submit-typed');
         }
      });

      //remove after test PO-1400
      $('.js-full-width-cancel').click(function () {
         tce(getSelectedTab(), 'search-cancel');
      });


      storeSearchStorageModel();
   });
</script></div>
         </div>

      </div>

   <script>
         $(document).ready(function() {
            $('select.result-sorting').on('change', function() {
               var $this = $(this);
               var selectedOption = $this.find("option:selected").data("tce-action");

               tce(c24.meta.pageId, selectedOption);

               // DS-1: log manual price sorting + DS-7: sort by newest
               if ($this.data('vl')) {
                  if (selectedOption.indexOf("price") !== -1) {
                     var logEvent = selectedOption.indexOf("price-desc") !== -1 ? "price-desc" : "price-asc";
                     trackVisitorLogEvent(logEvent);
                  } else if (selectedOption === "sortOrder: newest") {
                     trackVisitorLogEvent("sort.newest");
                  }
               }

               c24.tools.open($this.val());
            });
         });
      </script></div>

            Trier par</p>

                     <h2 class="h1 m-t-0 m-b-5 text-center"><span id="Combien+coÃ»te+une+Rolex+Submariner+?">Combien coÃ»te une Rolex Submariner ?</span></h2>

         <section>
               <div class="js-hero-image-content container s3-descriptions">
                  <div class="row p-y-6">
                     <h2 class="h1 m-t-0 m-b-5 text-center"><span id="La+Rolex+Daytona+:+un+excellent+investissement">La Rolex Daytona : un excellent investissement</span></h2>

   <div class="multi-text-columns">
      <p class="text-lg">La Rolex Cosmograph Daytona en acier est l'un des meilleurs investissements que l'on peut faire dans le secteur horloger. Le modÃ¨le en acier introduit en 2016 et portant le

<script>
   var _stickyLayerId = '#jq-change-domain-hint-layer-sticky';

   function stickyChangeDomainHintLayer() {
      if(window.externalChatWidgetPresent()) {
         $(_stickyLayerId).remove();
         adjustStickyBottomAnchor();
      } else {
         c24.stick(_stickyLayerId, {
            direction: 'bottom',
            condition: {
               timeout: 2
            },
            onEntered: function () {
               c24.tools.fixSupportWidget();

               c24.data.setString('125', '1600584434661', 1296000);
               c24.data.setString('126', '1', 1296000);

               trackGA({
                  'eventCategory': 'Tracking',
                  'eventAction': 'show-change-domain-hint',
                  'eventLabel': 'www.chrono24.in',
                  'eventNonInteraction': true
               });
            }
         });
      }
   }

   function dismissLayer() {
      c24.tools.fixSupportWidget();

      var oldValue = c24.data.getString('127') || 0,
         newValue = parseInt(oldValue) + 1;

      c24.data.setString('127', newValue, 1296000);
   }

   function openLocalizationChangeColorbox() {
      tce('www.chrono24.in', 'change-settings-change-domain-hint');

      c24.colorbox.createJsonp('/localization-change.htm?ajax=1&suppressMobile=1&newCountry=en_IN&newLang=en_IN&newCurr=INR&referrer=change-domain-settings', {size: "md"});
   }

   $(document).ready(function () {
      $('.jq-change-now', _stickyLayerId).click(function(e) {
         e.preventDefault();
         tce('www.chrono24.in', 'click-change-domain-hint');
         dismissLayer();
         c24.switchLanguage('change-domain-button', 'en_IN', 'INR', 'goal_change_domain=1');
      });

      $('.jq-close', _stickyLayerId).click(function () {
         tce('www.chrono24.in', 'close-change-domain-hint');
         $(_stickyLayerId).remove();
         adjustStickyBottomAnchor();
         dismissLayer();
      });
   })
</script><div class="footer js-footer inverted">

      (function() {
         function riskifiedBeaconLoad() {
            var store_domain = 'chrono24.com';
            var session_id = '2ad4de4f-60de-4388-a4a8-2c9cad9a9692';
            var url = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://')
               + "beacon.riskified.com?shop=" + store_domain + "&sid=" + session_id;
            var s = document.createElement('script');
            s.type = 'text/javascript';
            s.async = true;
            s.src = url;
            var x = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            x.parentNode.insertBefore(s, x);
         }
         if (window.attachEvent)
            window.attachEvent('onload', riskifiedBeaconLoad)
         else
            window.addEventListener('load', riskifiedBeaconLoad, false);
      })();
      //]]>
   </script>

   function openCookieConsentLayer() {
      trackEvent('Tracking', c24.meta.pageId, 'show-consent-layer', true);

      c24.colorbox.createJsonp("/cookie/cookie-consent-layer.htm?ajax=1", {
         size: "sm",
         reinjectOnCleanup: false,
         escKey: false,
         overlayClose: false,
         closeButton: false
      });
   }

   $(document).ready(function () {
      c24.layer.show(function () {
         openCookieConsentLayer();
      }, 0);
   });
</script></div><div id="ad-container"></div>

   function responsiveSizeCookie() {
      
      var responsiveSize = c24.tools.responsiveSize();
      
      c24.data.setString('115', responsiveSize, 15552000);
   }

   $(window).load(function () {
      $(window).on('resize', function () {
         responsiveSizeCookie();
      });

      responsiveSizeCookie();
   });
